trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.SaveEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.

Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ActivateEvent" />, <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Deactivate" />, and <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.WindowSize" /> events.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ActivateEvent" />、<see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Deactivate" /> 和 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.WindowSize" /> 事件的处理方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.WindowEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.WindowEventHandler> 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, until you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 每当发生该事件时，直到移除了该委托，都会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an event handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.WindowSize> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建的事件处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.WindowSize>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler displays in the window caption the number of times that the window has been resized.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序的窗口标题中显示的已调整窗口大小时的次数。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。
